title: Signature Design by Ashley Cimarosse Contemporary Tufted Accent Chair, Gray
features: CONTEMPORARY ACCENT CHAIR: Simple elegance is timeless, and this chair proves it true. Clean lines allow the chrome tone base to shine through, while neutral cushions match with all color schemes
COZY SEATING: Relax on high resiliency foam cushions upholstered in polyester. Designed with a metal, chrome tone finish base and supported by a corner blocked frame
CHIC DETAILS: Light gray upholstery looks so classy with the chrome tone base and button tufted seating. Where it lacks armrests, it makes up for in upscale refinery
GREAT IN ANY ROOM: Measuring 25.75" W x 28.5" D x 34.25" H, set this chair in a modern living room, and watch how it transforms your space and encourages rest any time of day
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included
Note : To ensure proper assembly, please follow all steps provided in the installation manual (provided in pdf below)
description: Button-tufted seat? Yes, please. This armless accent chair allures with contemporary appeal. Gorgeous chrome-tone base supports two comforting light gray cushions. Its neutral aesthetic complements your home with an upscale touch. The unique design and fabric of an arm chair or armless chair can turn it into quite a conversation piece. Our chairs are available in all different styles, sizes and shapes, with coverings that include genuine leather, microfiber or deeply tufted upholstery. Youâ€™ll find plenty of accent chairs that combine beautiful design with quality materials to create a welcoming seat. And we go the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner.
